posts.title: Pizza BBQ Grilling Stone
posts.content: Ditch the oven and cook a pizza at a park, a tailgate party, or even in your own backyard with these pizza barbeque grilling stones. These BBQ pizza grilling stones can be used on any type of barbeque and are dishwasher safe, and is a perfect gift for the weekend BBQ’er.

posts.title: Cleaner Than Shit Hand Sanitizer
posts.content: Keep your hands looking clean and fresh at all times by using this “Cleaner Than Shit” hand sanitizer. No matter how much shit the day throws your way, just apply some of this world class sanitizer and you’re good to go.

posts.title: How To Run A Drug Cartel
posts.content: Learn everything necessary for your budding narcotics racket to thrive using this “How To Run A Cartel” book. This compelling read guides you through every aspect of this multi-billion dollar business – from creating brand value to fine-tuning customer service.

posts.title: Finding Nemo Pool Toys
posts.content: Relieve the fun and excitement of your favorite underwater 3D adventure with the Finding Nemo pool toys. Nemo and his radical little turtle buddy have journeyed from the land down under to hang out and splash around in your pool.

posts.title: Pacifier Grillz
posts.content: There’s no such thing as too young for a little bling bling – so help your newborn run the streets from a young age with the pacifier grillz. This pimped out pacifier keeps your young G calm and quite while they flash their gold and diamond covered smile at the world.

posts.title: Gummy Worm Straw
posts.content: Enhance the flavor of any drink with the gummy worm straw. These whimsical and tasty looking straws are designed just like the delicious gummy worms we all love. These wacky straws will turn lunch time into the most enjoyable part of your kids day.

posts.title: Pancake Batter Pen
posts.content: Bring out your artistic side while you prepare a delicious serving of pancakes with this fun to use pancake batter pen. This nifty pen allows you to easily create all kinds of shapes, so you can make a heart pancake for your kids, and a middle finger for your estranged husband.

posts.title: Luggage Weight Scale
posts.content: Never pay another overweight fine at the airport by checking your luggage beforehand with this portable weight scale. This convenient and portable tool attaches to the suitcase’s handlebar and displays its weight on an LCD display when you lift up the bag.

posts.title: Pixel Mouse
posts.content: If you’re a computer geek but high end computer mouses aren’t your thing then you’ll love the pixel mouse. Designed to look like a pixelated pointer hand, this geeky computer mouse is a cool gift idea for geeks and fans of the old school pixelated computer hands.

posts.title: Waterproof Fire Starter Tinder
posts.content: Create a life saving inferno in the midst of a torrential downpour with the waterproof fire starter tinder. It burns smokeless and ignites extraordinarily fast even in extremely unforgiving weather – to provide warmth and protection when you most need it.

posts.title: Proceed With Caution Doormat
posts.content: Greet new guests with a little humor by setting this “proceed with caution” doormat outside your home’s entrance. This high quality choir mat measures 5.75 x 23.6 inches and features a sturdy PVC backing to prevent slippage.

posts.title: Flamenco Dress Duvet Cover
posts.content: Make bedtime more caliente by dressing up as a spicy latin dancer with the flamenco dress duvet cover. The design on this puffy comforter features an attention-grabbing red and black flamenco piece adorned with white polka dots that any little girl would love.
